name: Timeslip
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You adjust the initiative of up to three other creatures within range as you please. Unwilling creatures can make an Intuition saving throw to avoid the effect on a success.

The current initiative count is unchanged, and follows the new initiative order after your turn ends, even if a creature has already taken their turn this round.

This spell is particularly exhausting. The first time you cast this spell each rest, it costs 2 AP. After you cast it, it costs 5 AP until you finish a break or rest.
empower: Range becomes Self (30 foot radius), and you can affect any number of targets within range.
